name: Visitation (YamiNoTama, dividlibro)
description:
Only you know tragedy will strike It was supposed to be nothing but a pit stop. A short visit to a quiet town on their way to L.A. quickly turned into disaster for Paige and Grigol. A situation that threatens to destroy the fragile relationship between the two, that just begun to heal. Confronted with the loose ends of their past, the two of them set out to stop the approaching catastrophe, unaware of just how grave the stakes truly are. "Visitation" is a dramatic Visual Novel Thriller about social connections, personal growth and believe. Gather intel, form alliances or burn bridges. Whatever you do, it's your decision. This game features descriptions of violence, abuse and death, depictions of blood and audio displays of screams and gunshots.

This game was created as a part of Vampire: The Masquerade game jam 2022. Events portrayed in this game are not canon within the World of Darkness universe.

Project made by @dividlibro and @yaminotama

If you like the project, please consider subscribing to Dividlibro's Patreon
